medical_history.chief_complaint: Prelingual sensorineural hearing loss and goiter.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Deafness was of prelingual onset in all affected individuals. The index cases from both families presented with sensorineural hearing loss and goiter. The goiter was of moderate size in the index case of family II and her mother, who had a subtotal thyroidectomy in the past.
medical_history.past_medical_history: One family member had undergone a subtotal thyroidectomy.
medical_history.family_history: In family I, two siblings were deaf, and one was normal. In family II, both parents and two offspring were deaf.
